title: 1Dq
author: 1Dq
created_time: November 23, 2022, 05:11:32 PMLast edit: October 31, 2023, 05:31:07 PM by 1Dq
content: Hello everyoneI'm pretty much new here in "Services", but have been pretty active on this forum a while back.I created a bunch of BTC-related artworks and presented (and sold) them mostly in "Collectibles" section of our marketplace.I was also one of the highest voted artists in Theymos' 10th anniversary competition with my "10 years of constructing the future" digital piece:*****So after a while, I'm returning to creating crypto art!To get a better sensation of what I'm offering, I'm adding a couple of my (still available) pieces below.If you are either interested in them or you have an idea for a commission of your own, you can either reply below or send me a PM. I'm also very much interested in collaboration in projects and expanding the imagination of what crypto is and could be!Here's some more of my artworks, hope you enjoy them.CHEERS!MY ARTWORKS:Bitcoaster, 2018, Acrylics and Gold on Canvas, 70x100cm/27,6”x39,4” Reference and animated gif: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4314626Also presented on meme creator Brainless tales' site: https://bitcoincoaster.com/about/Litecoaster, 2018, Acrylics and Silver on Canvas, 70x100cm/27,6”x39,4” Reference and animated gif: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=4314626The Bitcoin Miner, 2018, Acrylics and Gold  on Canvas, 111x91cm/43,7”x35,8” Reference post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5107629.msg51309764#msg51309764Egging on the Future, 2018, Acrylics and Gold on Canvas, 65x55cm/25,6”x21,7” Reference post: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5107629Etheria, 2018, Acrylics on canvas, 60x40cm/23,6”x15,7”  Cryptoglyphs, 2018, Acrylics on Canvas, 145x190cm/57”x75”Reference thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5065782It's nothing, 2019, Acrylics on Canvas, 25x30cm/9,8x11,8″ Reference thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5181449

comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on November 23, 2022, 06:18:38 PMWhat about "The Wailing of Crypto Winter" ??https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5156947Hey Minerjones!Yes, that's actually one of my favorite fun pieces there, thanks for adding it to the collection
